name: It Weighs You Down
description:
You've been down here for a long time. Maybe you've tried to climb out before, maybe this is your first attempt. Maybe you need to cast off the weight of what happened, maybe you feel you can bear the load. But for once in your life, you have a choice.

Use the arrow keys to move around and give away items. Features three separate endings.

Created for My First Game Jam: Winter 2018, using the optional theme "Memories."

CW for mentions of abuse, and surviving/recovering from it.

Made in Bitsy http://ledoux.io/bitsy/editor.html
